data.message: I'm so thankful for FB I finally found the friend from junior high that I have looked for for 42 years. Thanks for giving me all of my friends back that I lost touch with over the years.

replies.message: You're welcome Sandy! We hope you are able to have a reunion with your friends soon. - Elissa

We have a reunion every summer from my old neighborhood. Then we have little get togethers through the year. Hoping to get another friend I found to make a trip up to Traverse City Mi. to see the last friend I found. You guys rock.
That is fantastic, Charlie! We are so happy that you are enjoying your Facebook experience. -Chantal
Thank's to FB, I found the Better Girl in my life^.^ Even tough she's so far away. "Iowa to Philippines"
